name: ALITA GOLD
description: Alita Gold (ALITA) is a new and promising cryptocurrency project that combines elements of a game with real money withdrawal and staking opportunities. This token offers a unique ecosystem in which users can earn by playing a blockchain-based game and participating in the staking process. The essence of the game is that you need to create new areas daily and improve them by creating gnomes with a pickaxe, mines with minecarts; plant and grow carrots and other crops. For each improvement, the user is awarded ALITA tokens.
